snippet: The deal, which would create one of Europe’s largest asset managers, reflects the rising pressure on funds that try to beat the markets....

headline.main: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond
headline.print_headline: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond

lead_paragraph: The deal, which would create one of Europe’s largest asset managers, reflects the rising pressure on funds that try to beat the markets.
